results.t: Vulpix Pokédex: stats, moves, evolution & locations
How to beat alolan vulpix as charizard ex : r/pkmntcg
results.p: Just make sure it has a Defiance Band/Choice Belt equipped, or have some damage on it already, otherwise it won't be able to take Vulpix out ...

results.t: Snow-White Vulpix in the Snow - Pokemon Legends
results.p: Jan 28, 2022 — This guide will provide tips on where to find all five Vulpix, as well as reveal the rewards for completing the Request further below.
This Pokemon's Fire attacks do 1.5x damage if hit by one Fire move; Fire immunity. Drought. On switch-in, this Pokemon summons Sunny Day.
